error-noPropertyDetails: Enter a property name or number
error-invalidAddressLine1: Address line 1 must only include letters a to z, numbers and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-invalidAddressLine2: Address line 2 must only include letters a to z, numbers and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-invalidAddressTown: City or town must only include letters a to z and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-invalidAddressCounty: County, state, province or region must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-invalidPropertyDetailsLength: Property name or number must be 200 characters or less
error-invalidAddressLine1Length: Address line 1 must be 50 characters or less
error-invalidAddressLine2Length: Address line 2 must be 50 characters or less
error-invalidAddressTownLength: City or town must be 50 characters or less
error-invalidAddressCountyLength: County or region must be 50 characters or less
error-invalidPostcodeLength: Postcode must be 15 characters or less
error-noUpdatePremises: Update the property name or number if it’s changed or cancel the update if you do not need to make any changes
error-noUpdateAddressLine1: Update the address if it’s changed or cancel the update if you do not need to make any changes
error-noUpdateAddressLine2: Update the address line 2 if it’s changed or cancel the update if you do not need to make any changes
error-noUpdateAddressTown: Update the city or town if it’s changed or cancel the update if you do not need to make any changes
error-noUpdateAddressCounty: Update the county if it’s changed or cancel the update if you do not need to make any changes
error-noUpdateAddressCountry: Update the country if it’s changed or cancel the update if you do not need to make any changes
error-noUpdateAddressPostcode: Update the postcode if it’s changed or cancel the update if you do not need to make any changes
